abstract: Paintings by Adam van Doren, third-generation member of the Van Doren clan of New York and Cornwall, Conn, will be on view at Darren Winston Books and Prints Oct 18 through Nov 13 (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
snippet: Paintings by Adam Van Doren, a third-generation member of the of the Van Doren clan of New York and Cornwall, Conn., are on view at Darren Winston Books and Prints.
lead_paragraph: Paintings by Adam Van Doren, a third-generation member of the of the Van Doren clan of New York and Cornwall, Conn., are on view at Darren Winston Books and Prints.

headline.main: In New England, Taking on German Expressionism
headline.print_headline: In New England, Taking On German Expressionism
headline.seo: Adam Van Doren Takes On German Expressionism
